title: 138. Historic Recurrence Ft. Ian Wendt
itunes:title: 138. Historic Recurrence Ft. Ian Wendt
description: The next American who is going to change the world is you. On today's episode, Andy and the crew are joined by Ian Wendt, the founder of the Patriot Gear. They discuss the true meaning of being a patriot and how each one of us can be the agent for unity and change within the most inclusive community called America.
